site.description: This is the RXTX Update Site.

category-def.name: RXTX 2.1-7r4
category-def.label: RXTX 2.1-7r4
category-def.description: RXTX 2.1-7r2 plus disable-version-output (RXTXCommDriver v1.16.2.57, RXTX bug 71), fix-deadlock (CommPortIdentifier, RXTX bug 83), disable-lockfiles, sparc-sun-solaris2.7 support (RXTX bug 73)
